definitions.title: n. pr. mont.
definitions.body: Ebal, the mt. of cursing, N. of Shechem (Nabulus), and opp. Mt. Gerizim (mt. of blessing, S. of Shechem), De 11:29, also Jos 8:30, Jos 8:33 (D); LXX Gaibal (connex. with above √ dub.; on [[בל]] = Bēl, cf. Gray:Prop. N. 124 n., and reff.);—on Ebal v. Rob:BR ii. 275 ff. GASm:Geogr. Ch. vi. Di:Dt 11, 29 Dr:ib. Bd:Pal. (1898), 257.
